name: simplepleb/modulemanager-module
description: Used to manage, install and configure Laravel modules

suggest.spatie/laravel-permission: To be able to set access by role and permissions
suggest.joshbrw/laravel-module-installer: Makes installing and updating modules simple
suggest.simplepleb/menumaker-module: Build dynamic menus for your front and back end
suggest.simplepleb/thememanager-module: Manage themes for front-facing and admin panels
suggest.simplepleb/article-module: Complete article post and category module
suggest.simplepleb/content-module: Manage site content and front-facing pages
suggest.simplepleb/tag-module: Add tags and taggables to content
suggest.simplepleb/themes: A library of starter themes for your laravel project
